name: Orbit 28964 Easy Dial 4-Station Indoor Sprinkler Controller Gray
short_description: Flexible Watering Options: With the Orbit 4 zone indoor sprinkler timer, you can easily set the water duration for each station between 1-240 minutes, ensuring your lawn receives the right amount of water every time
product_description: The Orbit 4 zone indoor sprinkler timer is a highly valuable product that provides you with the convenience and flexibility you need to water your lawn or garden with ease. Its user-friendly design makes it easy to set up and customize your watering schedule, and the various features like the rain delay, water budgeting, and dual watering programs allow you to tailor your irrigation needs to your specific requirements. With its reputation as a top brand in the sprinkler controller market, Orbit ensures you're getting a reliable product that will stand the test of time. Not only does this product offer great value for its price, but it also provides peace of mind knowing that you have a high-quality sprinkler timer from a trusted and reputable brand like Orbit.

name: Sprinkler Timer 2 Zone, Programmable Water Timer for Garden Hose with Rain Delay, Manual and Automatic Irrigation Controller System, Waterproof Water Hose Timers for Yard, Lawn, Pool
short_description: 【2-Zone Independent Hose Timer】The Rvwsx sprinkler timer features two separate outlets, allowing you to set individual watering schedules for different areas with customized start times, frequency, and duration. Enjoy precise control to keep your plants perfectly watered, preventing both over- and under-watering.

【Multi-Functional Irrigation Timer】The Rain Delay mode lets you pause watering for 1 to 7 days, preventing overwatering and conserving water during rainy periods. The Manual Watering mode allows temporary watering without affecting the preset schedule, with the flexibility to choose different zones as needed. (Note: The Rvwsx dual hose timer does not include a rain sensor, so you can postpone watering based on your local weather forecast.)

【Reliable Irrigation Timer】This faucet timer is equipped with a built-in metal filter that effectively filters out impurities in the water and can withstand up to 35 kg of water pressure. It is made of IP54-rated waterproof and impact-resistant materials, and the battery cover is sealed with a rubber gasket to prevent water from entering.Lasts up to 600,000 cycles for long-lasting performance.

【Low-Battery Warning】This water hose timer is equipped with a 3.3" easy-to-read LED display that clearly shows the watering time, next irrigation schedule, power status, and other key details. When the battery runs low, the valve automatically shuts off to prevent water waste.

【Intuitive Programming】 The dial and buttons feature bright white font accents, ensuring clear visibility of all settings at a glance. With its simple, tool-free design, programming is as easy as 1-2-3, making watering effortless.

name: Orbit 57865 Battery-Operated Sprinkler Timer, Black
short_description: For battery-powered operation of up to 4 automatic sprinkler or drip valves
Engineered with high degree of water and dust resistance for outdoor locations
Comes standard with one solenoid, adapters for a variety of 24 VAC valves, and mounting bracket; compatible with 24 VAC valves from Orbit, Hydro-Rain, and other major brands
A and B program slots allow you to set up to two unique watering schedules; rain delay feature allows you to skip watering of zones during rain or freeze
Each program has up to four different start times for cycle and soak windows; manual mode allows you to run one zone, multiple zones, or all zones
product_description: Introducing the Innovative Battery-Powered Sprinkler Controller with 1" FPT Jar-Top Automatic Sprinkler Valve. Upgrade your garden and yard with this cutting-edge water irrigation timer and automated sprinkler system. No need for sprinkler wires, this timer is designed for hassle-free installation directly to the mainline or as part of a multi-valve manifold. Control up to four valve solenoids simultaneously with our technologically advanced timer. Set up two unique watering schedules for different zones in your lawn. Each program allows four start times, promoting water infiltration and healthy plant growth through cycle and soak windows. The battery-powered timer will automatically "stack" overlapping runtimes, optimizing water usage.Conveniently run one zone, select zones, or all zones with the manual run feature. Ideal for zone testing or supplemental watering. Skip watering zones when Mother Nature takes care of it with the rain delay feature. Installing this comprehensive outdoor sprinkler timer is a breeze. Simply install the valve, insert 2 AA alkaline batteries for a full season of reliable operation, and set the schedule with the removable control dial. Place the mounting clip and timer on the latching solenoid for secure placement. For fast, glue-free installation, we recommend our recommended fittings: 1-inch MPT PVC-Lock for PVC pipes or Blu-Lock for poly pipes.Upgrade your outdoor irrigation system with this dependable, efficient, and technologically advanced battery-powered sprinkler timer. Say goodbye to tedious manual watering and hello to a lush, healthy lawn. Experience the convenience of our innovative water timers for garden and yard. Order now and enjoy the benefits of a smart, automated sprinkler system.

name: WiFi Sprinkler Timer,TRJZWA WiFi Water Timer for Garden Hose with Brass Inlet,TRJZWA 2-Zone Water Hose Timers Outdoor with Rain Delay Automatic Irrigation System Controller for Garden, Yards and Lawns
short_description: [APP Remote Control]Use the Smart Life APP to associate the wifi water timer with the wifi gateway (2.4 GHz WiFi only), which can help you set watering schedules and control irrigation anytime, anywhere. The wifi sprinkler timer supports longer-distance connections and provides a more stable signal to create a smart irrigation system for your garden. In addition, you can also add family members to the app to share the fun of irrigation together.

[Two Independent Water Outlets]This wifi water timer for garden hose has two completely independent water outlets, and each smart hose timer zone operates independently, allowing you to customize different watering schedules for each zone. Allowing you to easily cope with multiple scenarios, irrigation needs of multiple zones, and achieve efficient watering with automatic irrigation system controller.

[New Upgraded Material]TRJZWA smart wifi water timer is newly upgraded with pure brass rotating water inlet and metal thread, which is sturdy and durable, with enhanced durability. With the help of 360-degree rotatable inlet, it can be easily connected to the faucet, which is more leak-proof. In addition, the sprinkler timer wifi is equipped with a metal filter to prevent the problem of water pipe blockage, making it easier for you to manage your garden.

[Two Irrigation Modes]The wifi water timer has a timed irrigation mode and a scheduled irrigation mode, you can set up to 20 different irrigation schedules and customize suitable watering plans for different areas such as lawns and flower beds. The wifi water timer allows the hose timer to water at a specific time, you can customize the start time, duration to meet different watering needs. Once the watering schedule is set, the irrigation timer will take over the control of your garden.

[Rainy Delay & Manual Mode]The wifi sprinkler timer app will monitor local weather conditions and automatically activate the rainy delay mode on rainy and snowy days, delaying your plan for 24/48/72 hours to save water. You can also set the delay time manually. The smart water timer helps you easily cope with weather changes and save water. When temporary watering is needed, just turn on the manual mode with one click without affecting the watering schedule you set.

name: Smart Sprinklers Controller WiFi, Irrigation Controller Easy Use App Enabled, 4 Zone + 16 Plans, Save Water Auto Skin Rain, Freeze & Wind, 10 Minutes Install (Light Blue)
short_description: HiOazo 5 Years Leading Care

Easy Use App Control: Take charge of your sprinkler system from anywhere with the easy-to-use Hioazo app. Access watering schedules and monitor in real-time, so you won’t have to run back and forth to the garage anymore.

Weather-Smart Functionality & Save Water: Stay ahead of nature's curve with intelligent skip features. Rain, frost, or wind? No worries! Our system automatically adapts, skipping watering sessions during unfavorable conditions to prevent plant stress and conserve water.

Tailored Watering Solutions: Customize up to 16 watering plans across 4 zones, fine-tuning watering frequencies to suit your plants' needs. Whether it's daily drenching, intermittent hydration, or weekly soaking, achieve the perfect moisture balance for every corner of your yard.
Two Irrigation Modes: Select between Standard Irrigation for continuous watering and Soak Irrigation to allow soil ample time to absorb water, promoting healthier plant growth.

Effortless Setup in 10 Minutes: Transform your garden in no time with our DIY-friendly installation, taking just a quick 10 minutes to complete. Compatible with a whopping 99% of existing sprinkler controllers, our system ensures seamless integration for hassle-free operation.

Or the water hose timer allows you to cycle watering during the time period you set. You can set up to 20 different irrigation schedules for your plant, garden, greenhouse, lawn, yard, vegetable garden, fruit/vegetable irrigation, flowerbeds, pool, etc. Easily monitor and manage your watering schedule by checking irrigation history

Rain Delay & Manual Watering - Our automatic sprinkler timer features rain delay function that can be postponed by 24H/48H/72H according to your schedule. This ensures that you don't waste water unnecessarily and protect your plants from overwatering. As well as a manual mode for more flexible watering schedules, more smart to create optimal watering routines, so that your outdoor stay green. Ideal for many outdoor places. The wifi water timer is used for lawn sprinkler controller, automatic drip irrigation, outside patio misting cooling, garden watering, soaker hose, pool filling, pet drinking, etc

Upgraded Leak-Proof Design - The wifi hose timer is made of premium ABS material and Brass Inlet, durable, fortified with an anti-UV coating to withstand outdoor climate. With an IP55 waterproof rating, it's designed to endure various weather conditions. The battery cover is equipped with a rubber ring, effectively isolating moisture and enhancing longevity. Support 2*AA 1.5V Alkaline batteries(excluded). Additionally, each garden hose timer includes thread seal tape to prevent any potential leakage, ensuring a reliable and watertight irrigation system for outdoor use

Smart Voice Control & Expand Irrigation System - Hose timers for watering with smart home systems like Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant enables voice control. You can control the irrigation timer with simple language command. Enjoy the convenience of controlling your watering system with your voice. With the capability to expand up to 32 WiFi water timers using just one WiFi hub. This system offers unparalleled scalability for managing irrigation across large gardens or landscapes. You can add family members to the app to share home irrigation management. This feature facilitates shared access and coordination among household members, ensuring the garden receives optimal care and attention

Please Notice - 1. When you away from home, control the automatic watering system via app. It's important to note that the hub and WIFI hose timer should remain in place, with the hub consistently plugged into a power supply. 2. Battery Maintenance: For optimal performance, it's recommended to use brand new 1.5V AA alkaline batteries in the timer. Avoid mixing old and new batteries, as this can lead to inconsistent power output and potentially affect the garden hose timers for watering operation. By ensuring all batteries is new, you can maximize the reliability and longevity of your irrigation system

Perfect After-Sales Service - If you encounter any problems in the process of operating the water timer for hose, you can read our user manual first. If your problem is not solved, please feel free to contact us by email, we will give you a satisfactory reply within 24 hours

name: Outdoor Garden Hose Faucet Timers, Programmable Water Sprinkler Timer with Rain Delay/Manual/Automatic Drip Irrigation and Lawn Watering System for Yard, 1 Outlet
short_description: 【Easy to Program】Rotate the dial and press the buttons to set clock, how often (watering frequency), how long (watering duration), start time, auto, and off. Watering Frequency from 1Min to 23h59Min or 1 to 7 days, each Watering Duration is 1min-23h59min. The sprinkler timer can customize your watering time to meet your flexible watering needs.

【3 Watering Modes】The outdoor sprinkler timer has 3 watering modes to meet your different watering plans. Under Auto mode, the hose timer will run as the schedule you set before, no need to worry about watering plants when you go out the town. With Manual mode, you can use faucet to do other things from 1min to 23hours59 mins without interrupting your schedule. In rainy day, the rain delay setting helps you pause your schedule 1-7 days and will be automatically resumed, saving water and bills.

【Bigger LCD Display & Child Lock】Larger screen makes you check readouts much easier. Child Lock mode keep the garden hose timer safe from kids and pets activities, avoiding mistaken operation. Powered by 2*AA 1.5V Alkaline batteries (not included) and can be run for over 6 months.

【Long-lasting & Durable】 Insoma water hose timer is made of IP55 waterproof material and added a seal ring in the battery cover to isolate moisture. The material of hose timer's connector is added 35% fiber, which can withstand high water pressure from 7.25 psi to 116 psi. Each sprinkler timer is equipped with an additional reducing hex bushing (3/4" Male NPT to 1/2" Female NPT) and thread seal tape to fit different size hoses or faucets to prevent it from leakage.

【Multi-Scene Use】With waterproof and leak-proof function, the garden irrigation system timer is deal for outdoor gravity drip irrigation system, garden irrigation watering, lawn sprinkler controller, greenhouse mist system, pool, etc. Package includes: water timer*1, thread seal tape*1, quick connector*1, manual*1.

name: RAINPOINT Sprinkler Timer, 4 Outlets Hose Timers, 4 Zone Water Timer for Watering with Rain Delay/Manual/Automatic Timed Irrigation Controller System for Lawn
short_description: 4 INDIVIDUAL PROGRAMMABLE ZONES - The 4 Zone sprinkler timer allows you to customize the watering schedule (start time, duration and frequency) for each zone so that you can set a suitable watering schedule for plants in 4 different zones.

3 TIMED WATERING CYCLE MODES - This 4 zone water timer for garden hose can be flexibly set start time in 12-hour or 24-hour format, watering duration from 1-3 hours 59 minutes, and watering frequency in every 1-12 hours, or every 1~7 days. Don't worry about no one watering plants anymore, travel with confidence.

RAIN DELAY & MANUAL WATERING - Starting Rain Delay Mode before rainy days, the water timer with 4 zones will stop watering and skip 24/48/72 hours, thereby avoiding watering on raining days and saving money on your water bill. The Manual Watering Mode allows you to easily wash your car/garden floor/water your flowers (from 1min-8h) without changing automatic timed watering schedule.

EASY TO USE AND SET UP - The 4 zone irrigation timer has a large 3.3-inch LCD display, a large dial and 4 clear buttons, simple and intuitive user interface, very easy to read and program, friendly to first-time users. It fits 3/4'' faucets and 3/4'' standard garden hoses, can be used in most gardens.

HEAVY-DUTY STRUCTURE - The 4 station sprinkler timer is designed with a weatherproof heavy-duty structure. The water inlet is made of Brass material and a reinforced column is added, which can withstand higher water pressure up to 116PSI, and effectively reduces thread wear and prevents water leakage. No fear of sun, wind and rain, ideal for outdoor use.

FULL PROTECTION - 4 AA batteries (not included) are needed for the 4 outlets sprinkler timer, and when the batteries are going to be powered off, low power indicator will flash on the display to remind you to replace the battery asap, and the valves will also close automatically in time to avoid flooding.

NOTE 1: Only one zone valve can be opened at a time. When multiple zones are running at the same time. Setting the repetitive working time may cause all channels to not work. NOTE 2: Product is close to 3lb. Please be sure to install metal rot at the back to prevent from being too heavy and falling, which may cause inlet to break.

name: WiFi Sprinkler Timer, Smart Bluetooth Hose Timer, Programmable Automatic Irrigation System with Remote APP, Compatible with Alexa Google, Watering for Outdoor Garden Yard Lawn, 1 Outlet
short_description: WiFi & Bluetooth Connection: It comes with a Wi-Fi hub to facilitate connecting to your network which is especially useful if your outdoor faucet or hose bib is too far from your Wi-Fi router to get a good signal. You can manage your watering schedule even if you aren’t home, as long as your phone has access to the internet. It combines Wi-Fi and Bluetooth functions, which means more stable, longer-range connectivity, and allows you to connect your phone via Bluetooth(50ft) in addition to Wi-Fi.

Smart APP & Customize Schedule: Programming is simple with the Smart Lift App. You can customize your watering schedule anytime, anywhere from your smartphone or tablet, you can choose the normal mode: for watering at a special time or the cycle/soak mode: for watering repeatedly within a period. it allows you to set up daily watering, odd or even days, start time, frequency, run time, depending on your plant’s needs, then this faucet timer will water your entire garden automatically.

Rain Delay & Manual Watering: Don’t let unexpected weather disrupt your watering plan. With the rain delay function, the Wi-Fi timer can delay your schedule to 24/48/72 hours via APP, ensuring your plants are not overwatered or underwatered. When you need to water temporarily, you can turn on the manual mode via the App according to your needs without affecting your set watering schedule.

Voice Control & Low Battery Warning: You don't have always to open the App when you're busy! The system can be operated with voice control via a WiFi hub from Alexa or Google Assistant. The control system operates on a pair of 1.5v alkaline batteries with a lifespan of more than 6 months. The hose water timer will shut off automatically when the battery goes below 5% to protect the timing system and prevent over-watering.

High-Quality Construction: The construction of this smart hose timer is one of the best in the market as it is made of impact and weather-resistance ABS material. It features a 100% brass female coupler and metal threads, which are more durable than ABS water inlets. The material is also completely waterproof and rated at IP55. The battery cover features advanced sealing material to prevent leakage and extend the service life.
